snippet: The Milwaukee Brewers unveiled a statue of their longtime radio voice on Aug. 31, and now the San Diego Padres are doing the same. The Brewers honored Bob Uecker, and the Padres planned to honor Jerry Coleman on Saturday.
abstract: The Milwaukee Brewers unveiled a statue of their longtime radio voice on Aug. 31, and now the San Diego Padres are doing the same. The Brewers honored Bob Uecker, and the Padres planned to honor Jerry Coleman on Saturday.
